TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: Creates and manages the threads that run workflow instances on the workflow runtime engine.

span.span: Creates and manages the threads that run workflow instances on the workflow runtime engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 預設由工作流程執行階段引擎使用， is used by the workflow runtime engine by default. 其中包括可在執行階段執行緒集區佇列中有多個工作流程執行個體的預設支援。It includes default support for having multiple workflow instances queued in the runtime thread pool. 如果您想要控制負責執行工作流程的執行緒，請使用 。If you want to control the thread that is responsible for executing the workflow, use .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當工作流程執行階段引擎從應用程式組態檔載入服務時，會叫用此建構函式。This constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file. 唯一有效的參數是 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows`，這個參數可指定能夠同時執行的工作流程數。The only valid parameter is `maxSimultaneousWorkflows`, which can specify the number of workflows that can be run at the same time. 將 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 設定為較高的值可能會導致 .NET 執行緒集區變空。Setting `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` to a high value might cause the .NET thread pool to starve. 這可能會在持續性服務嘗試完成持續性交易時造成逾時，因為 物件也會使用 .NET 執行緒集區。This could cause time-outs when a persistence service tries to complete a persistence transaction because objects also use the .NET thread pool. 如果沒有在建構函式或組態檔中指定，單一處理器電腦的 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 預設值是 5，而多處理器電腦則是 (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8)。If not specified in a constructor or configuration file, the default value for `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) for a multiple-processor machine. 請注意，(int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) 會因為整數算術的規則，而不一定與 (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。Note that (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.

span.span: An integer that determines the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified maximum number of workflow instances that the service can run simultaneously.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified maximum number of workflow instances that the service can run simultaneously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 設定為較高的值可能會導致 .NET 執行緒集區變空。Setting `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` to a high value might cause the .NET thread pool to starve. 這可能會在持續性服務嘗試完成持續性交易時造成逾時，因為 物件也會使用 .NET 執行緒集區。This could cause time-outs when a persistence service tries to complete a persistence transaction because objects also use the .NET thread pool. 如果沒有在建構函式或組態檔中指定，單一處理器電腦的 `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` 預設值是 5，而多處理器電腦則是 (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8)。If not specified in a constructor or configuration file, the default value for `maxSimultaneousWorkflows` is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) for a multiple-processor machine. 請注意，(int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) 會因為整數算術的規則，而不一定與 (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。Note that (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.

span.span: is less than 1.

summary.span: Gets the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.

span.span: Gets the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.

value.span: 整數，代表執行緒集區佇列可儲存的工作流程執行個體數上限。

span.span: An integer that represents the maximum number of workflow instances that can be stored in the thread pool queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是單處理器電腦，這個方法的預設值是 5；如果是多處理器電腦，則是 (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8)。The default value for this method is 5 for a single-processor machine, and (int)(5 * Environment.ProcessorCount * .8) for a multiple-processor machine. 請注意，(int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) 會因為整數算術的規則，而不一定與 (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount) 相同。Note that (int)(5 \* Environment.ProcessorCount \* .8) is not always the same as (int)(4 \* Environment.ProcessorCount), because of the rules of integer arithmetic.

summary.span: Notifies the that a workflow instance has started to run.

span.span: Notifies the that a workflow instance has started to run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會為等待加入工作流程執行個體執行緒集區之項目清單中的第一個工作項目建立執行緒。 creates a thread for the first work item in the list of items waiting to be included in the workflow instance thread pool.
